[vc_row el_class=”custom-header”][vc_column]

[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1623446304748{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

The Revenue Growth Platform

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1623092144585{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}” el_class=”overflow gradient-lt-dk-gray-with-ss-while-logo”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1583411856909{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”left-col-mob”][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text el_class=”m-b-0″ css=”.vc_custom_1621451420389{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”]

REPORT:
2021 Agency Outlook

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1621451397183{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”]

One Year into the Pandemic: Insights and Advice, an infographic with recommendations from Karl Sakas

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1588878863914{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”][easy-social-share buttons=”twitter,linkedin,facebook,mail” counters=0 style=”icon” template=”37″ size=”xs” point_type=”simple”][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ el_id=”passedEvent-column”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_id=”green-banner-row” el_class=”dk-lg-green-gradient-saturated hidden” css=”.vc_custom_1619533749048{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;background-color: #2f9926 !important;}”][vc_column el_class=”mobile-no-padding” css=”.vc_custom_1612907632757{padding-top: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-md-8″][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1612907709286{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: -10px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-12 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-12 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1525275406838{padding-top: 2% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1583364273895{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

See how your agency’s outlook and performance compare to peers worldwide, and get advice to help you grow.

[vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron” el_id=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]As the COVID-19 shutdowns started in 2020, we teamed up with agency consultant Karl Sakas to ask thousands of agency leaders to share their thoughts and fears.

People were concerned… but no one predicted the full impact on their life and their business.

A year later, we asked how they were doing—including the pandemic’s impact on their agency, how 2020 compared to what they expected, and their top challenges and changes for 2021 and beyond.

Based on their answers, Karl has developed four actionable recommendations you can start implementing today to help you grow in 2021![/vc_column_text]

Your host:

Karl Sakas

Agency Consultant, Sakas & Company

Agency growth is good… until it gets out of control. Karl Sakas helps agency leaders “calm the chaos” of running their business—through consulting, coaching, and training. Clients benefit from Karl’s agency operations background and experience in digital marketing since the days of dialup. His clients call him their “agency therapist.” When he’s not advising agencies worldwide, Karl volunteers as a bartender on an antique train. Learn more at SakasAndCompany.com.read more...

A little about Sakas & Company:
[vc_column_text]Sakas & Company is dedicated to helping agency owners calm the chaos of agency life. They recognize your agency is likely your #1 financial asset. But they believe that shouldn’t require working 80+ hours a week.

Instead, they help agency owners build sustainable, profitable businesses. You can finally do the work you love—while enjoying a rewarding life outside the office—and get paid well.

Want help? Visit SakasAndCompany.com to learn more.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”hidden”][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”]

A little about SharpSpring:
[vc_column_text]If you’re not familiar with SharpSpring, we’re a revenue growth platform with a powerful suite of sales & marketing automation tools to help you boost conversions and deliver results.[/vc_column_text][vc_video link=”https://vimeo.com/360856486″ align=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1583360124979{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}”]
Trusted by more than 2,000 agencies

[vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”209119″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1625777412448{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

[vc_row][vc_column]

A little about SharpSpring:
[vc_column_text]If you’re not familiar with SharpSpring, we’re a revenue growth platform with a powerful suite of sales & marketing automation tools to help you boost conversions and deliver results.[/vc_column_text][vc_video link=”https://vimeo.com/360856486″ align=”center”]
Trusted by more than 2,000 agencies

[vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”209119″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1625777412448{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1623420887599{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”m-t-minus hide-cta” el_id=”register”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”stop”][vc_column][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”sticky-mobile-button”][vc_column]
